text: Arau yisakale allahara santusti labhara babe arau nijara atma balistha karaara babe dhana-sampada byaya karae sihamtara upama haiche kono okha bhumita arasthita eta udyanara darae, ya'ta dharaasara barasuna haya, phalata tata dbiguna phala-mula utpadana haya; arau dharaasara barasuna nahale'o alapa barasune'i tara babe yathesta. Tomaloke yi karaa se'i bisaye allaha yathartha pratyaksakarai
